doc:
Lou Richards (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lou_Richards_(actor) 0 Lou Richards (born September 3, 1951) is an American actor and voice actor. Among his voice roles were Leader-1 in Challenge of the GoBots, Galtar in Galtar and the Golden Lance, and Flash Gordon in Defenders of the Earth. He is also known for playing Clark V. Uhley, Jr. in the short-lived All in the Family sitcom spin-off Gloria and Deputy Dennis Putnam in She's the Sheriff. Lou_Richards ( born September_3_,_1951 ) is an_American_actor_and_voice_actor . Among his_voice_roles were Leader-1 in Challenge of the_GoBots_,_Galtar in Galtar and the_Golden_Lance , and Flash_Gordon in Defenders of the_Earth . He is_also_known for playing Clark_V._Uhley , Jr. in the_short-lived_All in the_Family_sitcom_spin-off_Gloria_and_Deputy_Dennis_Putnam in She 's the_Sheriff .
